content.detailedDescription:
I was outside saying good bye to my wife who was on her way to work. i noticed a very bright light in the sky about 600 or 700 feet off the ground tracking very slowly from west moving east. it appeared to be about 3 or four miles away in a north east direction from my drive way. i noticed to was very much unlike a normal aircraft, there were no flashing red or green lights like conventional aircraft have. it was moving way to slow to be a conventional aircraft it hovered a few times as it tracked and seem to back up once or twice before moving forward again at times it would move vertically in what i would guess would be several hundred feet  in a split second then drop back down. it did not appear to be a star because i could see it clearly moving under cloud cover. after watching this thing move slowly across for about nine or ten minutes it shot like a bullet out of view heading toward the direction of richmond. that's about it. i am sure it was not a helicopter or any conventional aircraft i am aware of. when it was visible it moved too slowly for conventional aircraft and when it departed it moved too fast for conventional aircraft. as it tracked across my view it sped up and slowed down several times along with the "jumps" in vertical space also unlike any conventional aircraft. it was bright, too bright for a star at that hour of the morning. no other stars were visible because of the dense cloud cover that morning the sun was coming up and it was visibly traveling below the cloud ceiling. sorry i did not get a photo or video as my equipment was in the house and i didn't want to lose sight of it.

i would like to know if anyone else witnessed this event in the area.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Bright light tracked very slowly and irraticly from west to east about 3 mile north of my location

content.detailedDescription: Last night while going to visit a friend in the e.R. (near uc merced campus) i decided to glance at the nigh sky before heading into the car. my eyes were immediately greeted by a large color changing/ pulsating light (to the west). although it seemed to be a star it was switching colors rapidly and seemed to be in our atmosphere. it strobed green, blue yellow and violet, and although it was difficult to see (due to distance) it seemed as if it was growing and shrinking slightly. it was definitely awe-inspiring. i have seen many ufo's and sometimes come off as strange when i discuss it with people so i calmly asked my roommates what they thought of it (i have never discussed ufo stuff with them). they at first wrote it off as a star, then began to stammer and finally concluded that it was a ufo. we watched it for 10 0 15 mintues to see if anything would happen (it stayed stationary the entire time), sadly we had to rush to the hospital to see our friend. it was beautiful to view not only for its display of colors but the undeniable fact that it was not something often seen.
content.summary: Flashing light

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving the route 101 of mendoza, argentina, with 

2 friends, near a town called pareditas (8 miles away), the moon was rising so we stopped to 

take some pictures of it. i took 4 or 5 pictures and then we get back on the road. when we 

arrived home, we saw a green shape almost the size of the moon, near it, in the first 

photograph. it was very noticeable, and with good quality, a shadow slashing the green bulbs in 

halfs. in all the pictures the bulb appears in different positions. we couldnt find any 

explanation for that, not a flearing, a reflection or object created from the human beeing 

could show such colors and shape, over a huge field were no one lives.

i didnt contact anyone else about this, and don���t know exactly what to do as i believe my 

pictures are a valuable source of information to share with the world. 

looking forward for a response, so i can send you the photographs.

photographer *(wit's name deleted--cms/sg).

san rafael, mendoza, argentina.
content.summary: Multiple photographs of a green bulb with shape inside in different places at night

content.detailedDescription: Clear skies, came from south east headed west. stayed for about 30 mins before slowly sinking behind out of vision. it was flashing green, blue, and red.
content.summary: Larger then normal star moving slow

content.detailedDescription:
Facing south to toronto from newmarket at 7 pm cloudy a 2 engine jet coming from south east 1500 to 2000 ft high speed sharp bank can only be done by a jet{as a fighter jet evasive} turn as being afraid or chased to north.Then jet disapeers then a flash of light 1 to 2000ft above in clouds then a prop engine sound in clouds same direction 1/4 mile as if traveledin same direction.Ya right! i am a scientist mind first but this was obvious.
lets find out whats going on ok
i was outside work sneeking a cigarret and just looking at the weather clouds.
content.summary: Flash of light  jet dissapeered

content.detailedDescription: I am in my backyard letting the dog out for water. i look up like i always do and light my cig. i dont know all the stars by name but i know the dippers and orions belt and a few others. i dont know if its venus or the north star or what its called that orions belt points to. from that star up and to the left, a couple of hand lengths away there were two stars and i thought hmmmmm that is a really bright star and i dont remember a bright star being so close to another and in that location. i've lived in austin all my life and i know what the sky usually looks like. and yes when i was a kid chemtrails didn't exist and i noticed them first and now everyones talking about them. anyway... i've seen shooting stars one night with my father and we saw about 50 of them. they tend to have a slight bit of color to them. i watched the space shuttle with my father from one side of the horizon to the other and it took 3 min. like the papers said it would. all this from my backyard. that shuttle was hard to see and looked dim like other stars. this star was brighter than any other so i was puzzled that it only had white light with no sparkle or twinkle. this star was at a stand still. the two stars together were for several puffs of my cig. sitting together. the more i looked at it, it was as if it knew i was watching. then it moved. there was a brief instant of shock. i thought is it moving or is it the tree making it look as though it's moving. there is a big bare tree easily seen through in the middle of my yard. i put my hand up to make the texas long horn hookem high sign to get some degree of distance between them, to see if they were actually separating. over what felt like an 8 second time span my fingers grew wider until i could not spread my index and pinky any further apart. it moved about 6 to 8 inches in a straight line, the length of my fingers apart, while streached out pointing at the sky. then it slowly like a bulb or batteries going out in a flash light, went out. but it was moving up into space because it was no longer moving in any direction but away. i've seen enough planes to know if it should have still been in my vision from the size of the light to the distance and time it took to move like it did. this was nothing other than a ufo.. be it reversed enginered or other worldy life forms,don't know don't care. i'm not in shock or anything but i am amazed. you always want to see one but dont know how you will think about it after.      ps i dont know whats going on with your county button but you should look at it in this form.
content.summary: Star like ufo in my backyard 8:20 to 8:28    02-22-11

content.detailedDescription: Approximately 7:00 pm on tuesday february 22nd my husband, daughter and i saw what we can only describe as a ufo to us in the sky. we were standing in our back driveway and i looked up to see a bright "star" moving erradically in the sky.  i watched it for a few seconds and realized that it was moving much too quickly for any object i had ever seen in the sky and was moving too jerkily and quickly to be real. we watched it for a period of perhaps 5 or 6 minutes and then it took off across the whole horizen of the sky in the matter of 2 or 3 seconds and disappeared. we have never in our lives seen anything like this, and never expected to in our lives. we don't say this is alien or manmade but we saw it with our own eyes and are as amazed by it as anyone could be. our daughter only had her cell phone to get pictures of it and in the pictures it only looks like a series of dots in  progression but there were plenty of stars in the sky that didn't show up in the pictures. it was not a plane, a helicopter or anything we are used to seeing. we reported it to fox news and you. please let us know if you had any other reports. thanks for your time . *(wit's name deleted--cms/sg).
content.summary: Looked like a flashing star at times like the star of bethlaham blue streaks at times really bright.

content.detailedDescription:
I was outside smoking a cigarette and saw 3 spheres float across the night sky, they were much larger than stars and it was obvious they weren't airplanes (bigger and sphere shaped)  they glowed bright orange, the glow grew dimmer and brighter on and off.  at first i assumed they were meteors or similar-because i had never seen a meteor shower before.  but they were much bigger, and didnt simply fall from the sky to the ground.  they seemed to fall towards the earth at first, and then floated right, then started to fall again.  they moved in unison until the rightmost one trailed off to the right and seemed to dissapear.  the others fell behind a nearby mountain and i lost sight.  when they started to float and move right rather than downwards-it was in unison, seemed unnatural i guess. i was outside with about 15 people who also noticed it.
it seemed really strange to me and i've always thought about extraterrestrial life and things like that- id like there to be a believable explanation for these lights but im not sure there is any.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Glowing orange balls float through sky

content.detailedDescription:
I was young about 13 or 14 a neighbor kid and i decided we would have a sleep over in a tent in the front yard. i'm not sure what drew our attention to it, it was a long time ago but it was almost as if we just wanted to be outside of the tent at that time. we both instantly thought it was a ufo cause that's exactly what it was could have been alien or secret government craft either or it was ufo. it was quite and very low to the ground aprox. 15 feet above the tree line it flew in then hovered above us for a little bit then crept away gently just like it came in.
i would just like to know if there were any other sightings of this same one or the same type of ufo and am wondering if i should by put under hypnosis incase theres something big i missed (i hope not)
content.summary: Rectangular with a few lights one end wider then the other

content.detailedDescription:
I was headed home to enola, pa on interstate 81 south from the paxtonia area. it was early evening, but the sun wasn't down yet. as i approached the 81/83 split i noticed an odd triangular cloud high in the sky above and slightly to the left of me. i kept glancing up at it, because of it's regular shape and clean lines. i kept thinking, what a funny looking cloud it was. when i finally got a chance to stare at it for a few seconds i could see that it wasn't a cloud. it was an elongated triangle, sharply pointed at one end with three points at the other end. it was pointed straight up and moving that direction at what seemed to be a moderate pace. it appeared to be white in color except for an area just below the center where it was glowing yellow-orange. i could see what appeared to be condensation streaming down it's length starting about 1/4 of the way down from the pointed end. the condensation obscured any details of it's surface until it reached the glowing section. the condensation ended there, which i took to indicate that the glowing area was very hot. there was no con-trail left behind and no sound. no lights were visible. when i passed under the 83 overpass i lost sight of it for a few seconds. when i looked back up on the other side it was gone. nothing was left behind. i looked around and noticed passenger jets and other aircraft in the sky. it was at that moment that the ufo's size and speed became apparent. even though it hadn't appeared to be overly large it dwarfed everything else in the sky. i would have to say that it was many times the size of a 747 and was moving several times faster than the commercial airliners i could see. my thought at the time was that the ufo must have used some type of ftl drive to have vanished so quickly. if it had used some type of cloak or optical camouflage, why let us see it at all. initially, i wondered if it might be some new toy the military was playing with, but it's size was just too big. i can't imagine that we have ever built anything that large. then there was it's disappearing act. optical cammo, maybe, but why display it to the public right over the city. not likely.

i continued driving south on 81 toward enola and looking in the sky for anything else that might be unusual. when i was about half-way to enola i noticed six cigar-shaped or cylindrical ufo's flying in a circular formation headed north-west. they were silver-gray in color and fairly low in the sky. they appeared to be much smaller than the other ufo, but were still larger than anything else i could see in the sky. some were oriented horizontally and some were rotated about 45 degrees from horizontal and they all appeared to be flying sideways, with their entire length pushing through the air. they left no con-trail and there was no sound that i could hear. no lights were visible. they were headed in the general direction of the allegheny national forest. i lost site of them as i approached the enola exit. they were headed away from where the larger ufo had been and judging by the size difference, my thought at the time was that the larger ufo brought these cigar-shaped ufo's here and dropped them off. the cigar-shaped ufo's could be landing craft. after searching on the internet i found a picture that matches the cigar-shaped ufo's that was taken in colorado close to the same date. my impression at the time was that whatever these were they were not built by us. if we had built them, they wouldn't fly that way.

these were my first ufo sightings. i would like to note that if curiosity hadn't made me take another look at that funny-looking cloud i wouldn't have noticed the first ufo and would have completely missed the 6 smaller ones. i was surprised that they made no effort that i could see to hide from us. it was like they didn't care if we saw them or not. it was not what i was expecting. i have included a rough drawing of the first ufo.
content.summary: Large elongated triagle and 6 cigar shaped

content.detailedDescription: Trianglular ufo's here in southern california. first, kerman california, large triangular craft , amber lights flying relatively low, slow, silent hovering. 2nd, another low, slow flying craft but much smaller and with blue hued lights in visalia ca, 3rd was also triangular and with blue lights. it silently passed over my daughter and i as we watched it hover approximately 300 ft above as if surveying the landscape. incident lasted for 5 minutes. also, police officer reported ufo here in kerman in 1978. look into this. seems strange to have so much activiy for such a small town.
content.summary: Ufo activity, 1 in visalia ca, 3 in kerman ca, 1 already documented 1978

content.detailedDescription: My friend joel and i went for a walk through the burlington country club on friday the 18th of february to star gaze at around 9:00 p.M. about five minutes into our walk i noticed two orbs moving across the top of the tree-line to our right... one orb was higher than the other, although both orbs stayed the same distance from one another as they floated from right to left (they were moving at exactly the same speed). we immediately started to sprint across the snowy course off the path to keep up with the orbs. we finally connected with a different road than the one we'd originally been traveling down and continued following the orbs until we were on the top of a hill where we could overlook the williston area as well as the south burlington area (near the airport). the two orbs stopped but the one on the right hand side began to blink on its own tempo. after about five minutes of blinking, both lights started to turn on and off as they pleased until both vanished. it was hard to tell how far away the orbs truly were. last night, we went back out to the country club and spotted a single glowing orb... this time we noticed it in the distance and it made its way towards us at a slow pace, getting brighter as it drew nearer. this orb couldn't have been more than 50 ft above the tree line and it's glow became more intense as it got closer, again no noise. when it got within a half mile of us, it started to change direction. we followed it back towards where we came and lost it in the trees... within a minute, a cop car came down the road but didn't stop to chat as we were no longer on private property. i have one picture from the first sighting and a video from the second (last night). in the picture, you can see the moon and the orbs to the lower right hand side of the moon.
content.summary: Two orbs equidistant from one another about 1000 ft above ground, no sound, stopped and blinked.

content.detailedDescription:
Years ago, probably about 1968 (not sure), my mom (now deceased) myself (in college at the time) and a friend were leaving a gate house where my father worked as a gate watchmen.  the gate was located about 2 miles north of kingsville, texas.  the gate was the entrance to a small gas & oil plant (i think it belonged to exxon).  the gate was located in a fairly remote area at the end of a winding road about 2 or 3 miles long (no longer there) through thick south texas brush land.  we had just left the gate house after visiting with my dad (also now deceased), and were heading home probably around 10 pm.  we were no more than a quarter of a mile from the gate house, yet out of view because of a curve.  i was driving at a speed no more than 40 mph, and probably slower.  i noticed on the side of the road (the right side) a small object about 3 feet tall which was bright white and similar to a lattice or trellis.  it was maybe 2 feet wide at the base and seemed to taper like a triangle. it appeared to sit on a pedicel or post of some kind. 
after realizing what i saw, i stopped immediately and asked my mom and friend if they had seen it.  both replied yes, so i backed up past where i saw the object.  we all got out of the car and searched but the object was gone.  obviously, the object had to be able to move on its own or someone had to move it.  judging from the time it took to back up, and our extensive search of the surroundings, we felt no person was involved.  we were all very puzzled, and to this day have no explanation.  through the years i have mentioned it to some, but really never tried to investigate.  of course, back then there was no network like yours, so the incident was pretty much forgotten in time.  i have no idea why i'm only now trying to find out - perhaps i was prompted by one of your tv shows.  i thought perhaps someone else may have reported something similar and you would have it in your archives.
content.summary: White lattice type structure on side of road

content.detailedDescription: Noticed a bright fast moving object at about 45 degrees east south east traveling west north west 5 degrees north of over head. it was an intense white and at a high altitude. as it passed overhead it began to fade out as if the rising sun was the source of the light. at about 75 degrees west north west it faded out. it took about 5 seconds from first spot until total fade out. no other light source was seen. i assume that it could be a satellite, but i normally do not see them at this time of the morning or moving from east to west. sky was clear. cloud cover had just broken up about an hour before. moon was almost full to the south just above the horizon.
content.summary: Bright object traveling at high altitude and speed

content.detailedDescription:
I live in a residential neighborhood located south of route 30 in north huntingdon, westmoreland county, pa.  my location being south of route 30 is under a common flight path for pittsburgh international airport and allegheny county regional airport so i'm very familiar with the looks and
behavior of planes and helicopters in our area.

being a smoker and having a dog, i frequently go outside for the dog and smoke while waiting.
normally i don't pay a large amount of time looking around the sky, but since finding an old school chum online recently that i haven't seen in 30 years and finding out what she's been seeing in her neighborhood nne of me and several other areas around us, i've been looking for 'usual' sky objects for about 2 weeks now every chance i get.

even though i was told about some of the strange objects seen in the area, it did not prepare me for what i witnessed in person this night.

approximately 11:15 pm doing the dog/smoke thing and paying particular attention to the sky since receiving a text from my friend in murrysville who was seeing a few unidentified objects there, i saw what i can only describe as 'shock and awe'.  i am still pretty much in shock. it has turned my world upside down.

glancing around the sky which was full of partly cloudy skies and brisk winds coming from the nw heading se, i noticed many small star-like self-illuminated objects traveling from the sse toward the nnw.  when i say 'many', i mean like several hundred (and i say that as an understatement) of round spheres all moving in a static, fairly fast pace all heading in the same direction nnw towards monroeville coming from the direction of west of irwin, which is sse of here.  my response was naturally, "wtf are those!?"  i couldn't believe my eyes were seeing these things.

there seemed to be large groups of these round objects passing, then a pause, some stragglers, then another large cluster of them.  some above the clouds, some below the clouds.  it was like the sky's starfield was moving across the sky -- yet i could see the real stars holding their places.  maybe 3 feet wide at arm's length in width.  first, i tried to wake my husband, but he had to work at 5 am, and wouldn't get up to see them.  after ten minutes of this action, i then tried to call my friend to see if she was seeing it as well, but no answer.

some of them seemed to be grouped together in geometric shapes, some even in a "v" shape or boomerang configuration.  seeing as they were bright like stars, these could not be birds in migration nor balloons flying upwind, and the number of them rules out satellites or even aircraft. i need to mention that early on during the first batch or two, a helicopter with red lights was
flying in approximately the same path, not unlike it was pacing the spheres, or the reverse.

i was in awe.  i couldn't believe what i was seeing.  it seemed too unreal.  they kept coming, one batch after another.Then i saw higher up 2 very large crafts above the clouds moving like half the speed of the spheres/orbs.  very large as in 6 inches wide at arm's length!  a drawing is attached.  they reminded me of reddish spider web shapes with a weighted red light in center, pulling it down.  reminded me of an upside down pyramid or a "princess cut" diamond shape, a polygon but with 2 pie-like slices missing.  i could see a faint gray "cast" of the craft showing sections.  it had steady white lights at tips, 2 blinking smaller red lights, with bigger red light at 'tip'.  most lights were pretty dim.  only because it's fairly dark here could i see the detail.

i kept trying to call my friend hoping she'd answer. (she had texted me earlier that night, she told me there was alot of activity the night before and asked me to come over - i couldn't make it tonight - who would have though all this would happen over my house tonight).  finally at 11:45 pm she answered.  she'd been in her hot tub and didn't hear the phone.
i frantically explained what i had been seeing.  they were still coming in groups.  she searched her skies but couldn't see anything from her location during the time on the phone (which was from that period onward).  she told me to grab a camera and try to get any pictures i could with a timed exposure if possible.  as we talked, 2 more big pyramid/diamond shaped ones went by, one was underneath the other.   i tried to take pictures, but they didn't turn out too well (best one attached).  she was thinking of trying to drive to catch them to film them, but the direction they were traveling wasn't conducive to doing so (the distance was too great and terrain is mountainous).  at the direction (nnw towards monroeville --see satellite map) and speed they were traveling, it would have made it very unlikely they could be caught on film with better equipment, we thought.  but then more of them kept coming.  even after midnight, they were still coming in clusters.  i don't know how long i was out there, it could have lasted until about 12:30 am or so on the 20th.  in my best estimate, i'd say that at least  800 to more than 1000 of the small spheres/orbs were seen, plus the 4 bigger crafts.  then it stopped.  my friend checked all of the available webcams around the area in direction of travel, but most don't show too much sky, unfortunately.  the pittsburgh skyline one doesn't have an archive view option either.  just to make sure it wasn't my mind messing with me, she even pulled up the online flightaware.Com screen which showed no commercial aircraft in my area at all.  i just needed confirmation that some sort of new aircrafts weren't flying around that i hadn't seen before.  i wish i had the right equipment to film them.  the only videos i could find that showed similar behavior, but a much smaller amount of them is the online video of "ufo fleet guadalajara mexico".  my friend had a video she shot of a similar craft flying by her in 2009 that has a similar shape (9/14/09), but different lights (attached small portion of her video).  she says they can morph shape and size and change lighting, so perhaps it was one of the same kind flying by her area that i saw.

my first real undeniable ufo sighting experience, and all i can say is wow.    i'm not sure how to take this.  i'm not sure what to do about this information -- that we are not only not alone in the universe, but that we are being visited on earth by some visitors who come here with a very large number of crafts.  the sad thing is that most don't even know they are here.    i hope that others who may have witnessed this amazing sighting will come forward.  i can't believe i could be the only one who saw them.  i am feeling extremely anxious now not knowing what will happen due to their presence.  the next time they show up, if my husband's sleeping, i'm going to bash him on the head to come and witness this with me.
content.shape: Boomerang,   Circle,   Diamond,   Sphere,   Square,   Rectagular,   Star-like,   Other
content.summary: Several huge fleets of orbs traveling with 4 large crafts over north huntingdon towards monroeville

content.detailedDescription:
Really bright ufo was seen in northeast el paso, by two brothers, in a backyard, near hondo pass and railroad at 6:40pm. winds were at 3mph from se, no clouds. we were amazed by its brightness, movement, and pace. it was so bright it looked like a star, huge light in center, some light on top and some on bottom. slow ufo was seen headed southeast from franklin mountains. it passed over a fast moving, noisy airline jet, but once the jet disappeared, only a few passing cars could be heard. if it were a police/military chopper, or any kind of jet it would have been heard. ufo took an unusual path, a path that i've never seen a jet or chopper take. i spend a lot time outside, in my backyard, and see many airline/military jets and choppers pass by. after 4 minutes of going one direction, ufo slowly began moving northeast and vanished. 
unfortunately, i don't have a camera and my brother's was in storage so we couldn't capture anything. i got his camera from storage and will be looking to the sky for a few hours, tonight.
content.summary: Really bright ufo moving slowly in ne el paso

content.detailedDescription: My family and i had just left the gospel lighthouse church on north texaco road.  it was around 9pm.  we turned west on hwy 70 heading back to wilson oklahoma.  we had gone approximately 3/4 of a mile when we noticed a really bright beam shooting up into the clouds.  it was drizzling rain and a low cloud ceiling. rolled down my window and pulled over to the side of the road. i motioned for the kids and my wife to look across the road at the beam of light.  there were no houses over there and we thought at first it was maybe coon hunters fooling around with their lights.  but as we watched, we realized the beam was going higher and that is when we noticed a craft shaped light a disc which was lighted blue on top with a white lighted band around the middle and a glowing orange bottom and the beam of light was coming not from the ground but going to the ground from underneath the craft.  we watched this for about a minute and it rose slowly up into what appeared to be a dark lowering.  the light and the craft disappeared into the dark cloud or lowering.  we do not know for sure if it was a cloud.  it was drizzling and spitting rain.  our children were in the van with us and so was their cousin. everyone saw the craft and the light.  even today, they are grown men and still remember what they saw.
content.summary: We viewed from our van a craft rising up out of the woods.

content.detailedDescription:
The time is approximate because this happened when i was  17 was on a tv service call with my older brother robert.  we were heading west on fm 507 approximately 3 miles west of our home when i noticed this exceptionally bright light in the northern part of the sky.  a first i thought it was the moon but i never saw the moon in the part of the sky nor was it ever that bright.  we watched this light for several miles until we were getting ready to turn.  all of a sudden, the light did a "s" manuver and went straight up an was gone in the blink of an eye. my older brother who was driving rather slowly turned to me and i asked him what was that?  he said that it wasn't anything we have today that could that. 

p.S. at this time, i do not want third parties involved with me.  if you are interested in a couple more sightings let me know.
content.summary: Welding arc brightness, as big as a dime if held up to the sky,

content.detailedDescription: I was 23 yrs old living in milford on my way to the gym. it was 7:50 p.M. i remember the time because i had an 8:00 p.M. class to get to and i didn't want to be late. it was dark out. i looked up and saw a strange object with lights under it hovering in the sky just to the left of the bridge at exit 61, off of i95 in milford, ct. i had to cross the bridge to get to the gym in the center of town. i was driving south towards the i95 bridge when i looked up and saw this huge object with lights hovering just to the left of the bridge not very high up and i remember thinking wow what is that?  it was as big as a football field and looked rectangular-which may have seemed larger at the time because when i go back to visit my old neighborhood, it seems so small now. it wasn't a blimp i remember checking to make sure it wasn't a blimp. it wasn't moving, so i stopped and rolled down my window to see if i could hear anything, but heard absolutely nothing. i thought it was a ufo. i was debating whether to drive to the police station to report it or go to the gym to my class. for some reason i decided i didn't want to miss my class (now i am regretting that decision-i guess i figured i would see one again and as of yet i have not) i didn't report it then, but wish i had. i remember looking in the newspapers for a couple of weeks to see if anyone else saw it and i do remember seeing some reports of ufos in the area. i don't know where to go to find the archives for 1970's. (it may have been 1972-i am not absolutely sure). it was at the beginning of fall sometime. i think it was september, but it could have been october. it was so long ago. i was going to knock on a neighbor's door, but i didn't see any lights on. i was afraid of being abducted, so i stepped on the gas and just gunned it across the bridge and never looked back. i was sooo afraid. i went to my class and told my husband when i got home. i will never forget that night. i have believed in ufos ever since that happened. i think the lights on it were red and white, but i don't really remember. i wonder if anyone else in milford saw the same thing i did.
content.summary: It was the size of a football field with lights under it.

content.detailedDescription: On the afternoon in question,i noticed a flying object in a dispersing chem trail. the sky was high and very few clouds if any were seen. i was interested in a series of chem trail grids which are very frequent on long island. this time i saw ,what at first thought was a helicopter. i dismissed it because i saw no blade and that i am not aware of any helicopter that flew at that extreme height. it appeared to navigate left to right never going beyond the the chem trail. i watched it a few minutes on a s/e direction. i saw it for approx. 2 to 3 minutes when a branch from a tree to my left started to obstruct my view. i stood up from a park bench i was sitting on and moved a step or two to my right and was not able to pick it up again. it was like it disappeared. this has been on my mind since and was wondering if there was any other sighting similar to mine. ty for any info ,.
content.summary: Flying object in a dispersed chem trail

content.detailedDescription: I was traveling on i-480 west bound to i-77 north bound. i noted a dark object flying towards me. it look like a black aspirin floating slowly turning right to i-480. it bank right on it's fly-bye. i was riding my motorcycle while this event ocurred. the top and bottom of the object had cast iron look to it. the side wall radius appeared to be dark plastic with no visible stems to it. the top surface had a three pronged antenna that rotated counter clock wise. my estimated size of the object to be about 10-15 feet in diameter. the height of the object about 3 feet. i'm guessing the object was a probe or a drone by it's size. you have to understand i was riding my motorcycle in the opposite direction and not   see where it vanish into the sky. i was curious that no one saw this object or reported it to any of the news media. i felt a deep longing to see again. i was not afraid of the object but why did it appeared to me?
content.summary: I was traveling west bound on i-480 . i made a right turn exit onto i-77 north. i notice a black shaped object coming slowly towards my location. it look like a flying black aspirin with black cast top and bottom. the side wall radius look like dark black

content.detailedDescription:
There was a storm in the vicinity of gassville arkansas. the event lasted approx. 30 minutes. the shining glitter floated down as if to settle over the trees foliage. it looked just like a seen from the star trek's transporter. today i was watching an episode of ufos over earth. a person named denise was interviewed about, apparently, the same kind of event.

a couple of years later i saw a science documentary on ball lighting. i attributed this event, and excused this sighting due to ball lightning until today. 

they say, (scientist), ball lighting only last seconds, not minutes. 

this event was life lasting, and i will never forget it.

thanks *(wit's first name removed--cms/sg).
content.summary: I witnessed falling glitter over trees

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving to work, leaving springfield heading to kettering. i was driving on highway 70 going westbound, entering highway 675..As i was approaching the merge i happened to look up in the sky (it wasn't unusual to see aircraft flying above due to wright patterson air force base being so close)what i saw off in a near distance was some kind of air craft..I couldn't see the shape,because it was dark outside, however there were lights under the aircraft. the main thing that caught my eye was the sparks or sparkles coming out of the bottom of the craft. the best way i can describe it, is the sparklers that kids have on the 4th of july.. it looked very similar to those, but several coming down and disappearing before they hit the ground. i was on my cell phone talking to my mother at the time...She told me to hang up and take a picture with my phone. when i tried, the craft was gone. i thought it may have been something the air force was doing, so i thought nothing of it. then the next day, was 9/11/2001. i've told my parents, husband, kids and some friends about what i seen, but didn't think much of it..Until i was just watching your show ufo's over earth bucks county flap...When the woman was talking about the glitter falling and the image was animated, i started shaking. i never thought anyone else would have seen the same thing i seen. i have only seen two ufo's in my life,one when i was 8yrs old and it scared me half to death, and i do believe now, this was a ufo as well. 
that's my experience, thanks for reading.
content.summary: Object in the sky with sparkles falling from the bottom

content.detailedDescription:
I lived in a housing project on the top floor, the truth of this matter is far  from a boar, did alliens from space land on top of my roof? bright lites in my window i felt so uncouth! i was seven years old as i laid in my bed, somehow i was petrified from toes to my head! i saw two figurines which appeared in the night,they stood near my bed,i felt so up tight. another night i heard crushed gravel on the top of my roof. i heard someone walking i did not need proof. from the hole in covers  i saw two little men. uninvited guest, who dare let them in! i tried calling my brother who slept soundly near by, i was frozen in time,i was unable to cry! third nite came about,i was armed to a t, i found an inner strength somewhere with in me. i placed a bean shooter through the hole in my sheet, i waited for their arrival to stand near my feet. again i saw the light,heard the gravel and a noise near my bed. i blew through my bean shooter,hitting both in the head. a direct hitas they ran and scattered like mice, i gave chase behind and blew at them twice. i stood in the living room in the dark al alone, somehow from this battle,i matured i had grown. i tried telling my mother and after all that i said, her disbelief was a paassive pat on the back of my head. i knew what i saw and i saw what was true. you would not believe it untill it happens to you.

i was in my bedroom trying to sleep
i saw them (alliens) near my bed side
i could not believe my eyes
the two figurines moved around my bed
i felt scared but i was cool
content.summary: I observed two allien in my be my bed room i wrote a poem about it

content.detailedDescription:
I was at my grandmothers house playing cards and stepped outside to smoke.  i am a pilot and love astronomy.  i was looking up at the big dipper and orion when i noticed movement.  i looked at what was moving and got the impression i was not looking at an aircraft of this world.  it had 4 white lights that were steady.  the craft moved at around 200 knots in a straight line.  my only caveat is that it was flying along a common approach for american eagle out of dfw heading to txk.  their flights are due in around 9 pm however, the could be late.  the craft was at an altitude that i would expect an approaching am. eagle, around 2,500 agl.  the reason i don't believe that it was an american eagle plane, or any other plane, is that it did not have a red beacon, red and green recog lights, or strobes.  it also made no noise whatsoever, whereas you can hear american eagle planes as well as other private planes.  the diamond was not perfect.  below is the perceived shape with a capital "l" where the 4 white steady lights were.



front                 l
                     0 0
                    0   0
                   0     0
                 l0       0l
                   0     0
                     0 0
rear                  l
content.summary: Diamond shaped craft over ne texas

content.detailedDescription: Horses and dogs woke me up  a little after 2am on feb 13th 2011, i saw ufo's moving and shooting beams of orange lights down in the distance, i woke up my wife and she looked through the telescope and saw a ship with three vertical white  lights, the lights were so bright they had a spectrum look to them. we also so saw a ship that was triangular  shape with orange lights on the bottom of the craft, this one flew real low over our house. i saw many moving lights, many different colors in the sky that night that where no way planes. these lights didn't strobe like an airplane. also they didn't move like no airplane i have ever seen. i did catch a few photos and video but to be honest none of them are clear and show anything like what we saw with our own eyes and telescope. it was really cold outside so we were shivering, needless to say our videos and photos are shaking and blurry. we used our digital camera to video. when the morning came a large ship  came and all of a sudden we saw what we thought were stars start flashing and take off  across the sky until we could no longer see them. however we did see moving things in the sky for the next three nights as well. my brother also saw lights moving in the sky and he lives three miles away.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Lots of ufo's

content.detailedDescription:
I live near by nauvoo alabama there are lights seen pretty regular around here.  this was in sep. 2004 i belive early in the morning at my home.  this one could still be seen after sun up and i have it recorded on video.
this objects are still seen often around here.
content.summary: Moves around in sky white looking triangle

content.detailedDescription: I am 99% sure it was christmas eve. i had been at my aunts house and decided to drive home.  once i parked in front of my house, i got out and looked up at the stars.  i tend to do this every time i park because of odd things i have seen in front of my house in the past but i can't list because i don't remember the dates, just can recall the years of the other sightings. anyways, so when i exited the car that night, in the sky directly above me there were 3 orbs. one large and 2 smaller. they flew and hovered in a triangular motion.  i stood in the middle of the street and watched them for a few minutes and walked as i followed them. i tried to take photos with my iphone but the objects were much to high. they were very very high up, much to high to be a plane or helicopter or jet. they also flew much to slow to my knowledge to be something like a plane. i followed it down the block about 5 houses down.  there was some overcast so i kept my eyes on where i believed it was until the clouds moved and would follow it again.  the objects seemed to high they could be in space.  the largest moving orb would be slightly smaller than the north star in size, the others were maybe one to two sizes smaller than that.  after watching for a few minutes, i had called my neighbor to come out.  when he came, i asked to him to tell me i wasn't crazy and to tell me what he saw.  first he said that it was a plane or something like it and then once he saw how they moved he said he could not explain what it was.  they would hover at times, then move quickly then slow.  it never went straight for long it seemed as if it could move in whatever direction it wanted, go backwards ect. i felt very frightened at first when it was directly above me because i of course thought it would descend down. once it started moving i had kept my eyes and my feelings changed to curiosity. i just want to know what we saw and if anyone else observed it that night.  after 20 minutes had past, the overcast was much to heavy to see it any longer.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: 3 ufo's over street

content.detailedDescription:
I would like to go over two separate items, both related in a way to the phoenix lights incident.  i lived in arizona from aug 2005 - aug 2008 in pinal county city of maricopa.  the city of maricopa is not in the  phoenix valley, it's actually 20 miles or so south of the valley. i used to work on 19th ave and 101 in north phoenix.  driving home i would exit the highway 10 onto the maricopa highway heading south.  this route would take me to the back side of south mountain and the estrella mountains.  regularly around 8pm once i was on the maricopa highway and my view was no longer blocked by south mountain, i would see orange balls of light suspended in the air in formations of 1 to 2 to up to 6 or 7.  these lights would appear and dissapear, and as i got closer to the city of maricopa the lights would end up being much further away than first though.  my take on these lights is that they are flares from military excercises near the barry goldwater bombing range.  since i lived south of the valley, we had a much better view of the southern sky which people in the valley are unable to clearly see due to south mountain and the estrella mountains.  i, including my brother and several other family members would see these lights on a regular basis, and the sightings continued the entire time i lived in arizona and probably still can be seen.  these are excactly like the lights reported in the phoenix lights incident, the only difference is that they are low enough so that people in the valley cannot see them because the mountains are in the way.  in my opinion i agree completely with the analysis on the show i was watching on tv which prompted me to report this. on the night of the phoenix lights incident the flares were dropped at a high enough elevation and they could be seen above the mountain.  what i can say that if someone starting today drove the maricopa highway on a nightly basis around 8pm they would observe the same lights. they look like orang balls of light floating over the city of maricopa, but as you drive closer you realize they are much further south.  
after rationalizing the lights to myself and feeling 100% confident i know what they are, this second part of my story is a little different.  on the night of the phoenix lights incident, there was also a triangular shaped object described floating near south mountain. i had previously heard the stories on this object but i was completely and utterly shocked when i actually encountered it.  as i mentioned earlier, i worked in north phoenix for the first 6 months i lived in arizona.  i would drive 55 miles each way to get from north phoenix to the city of maricopa.  i left work one evening in january- feb time frame around 7pm and started heading south on highway 51.  in the north the drive starts off at a higher elevation which allows a view clear across the valley.  off in the distance i noticed a traingle formation in the area of south mountain.  it was strange because it almost looked like it was in the flight patter of planes coming in from the west and landing at sky harbor, but these lights were not moving.  i was still very far north and eventually driving down the 51 the view is blocked due to the walls, bridges, ect.  my drive down the highway 51 to the highway 10 to the maricopa highway was about 30 mins, so eventually i forgot about what i saw.  when i got off the 10 and started heading south on maricopa highway, i looked towards the mountains and was completely shocked to see this giant traingle formation of lights suspended right behind south mountain.  this object at this time must have hovering in the same area for over 30 minutes. it was 5 lights in a triangle formation, and it was very large.  i could not believe what i was seeing, and i actually pulled over on the side of the highway with another car and we both got out and looked at the object.  eventually the object slowly moved from behind south mountain in a northwest direction between the estrella mountains and dissapeared from my sight behind the north face of the estrella mountains.  this object was silent, and large, and did not change shapes.  it remained a triangle.  i can't explain the traingle, and how it remained it the same location for such a long period of time without being contested in any way.  i know sky harbor airport must have been able to see this object, but i didn't hear anything on the news.  my best guess is jan-feb 2006 when i saw it because i only worked at that location from oct 2005- march 2006 before deciding the drive was too far. i am still in shock that i actually saw the traingle that has been described in previous sightings.  it was right in front of me and the size of it was what i was so taken back by because when i initially saw it i was about 30 miles away. i don't know what it was, but i sure would like to know.
content.summary: Two seperate things, one was a series of cirular orange lights, the other a triangle

content.detailedDescription: I was asleep with my husband next to me. we had watched a movie and the tv was now on a blue screen with no other lights on in the room. i woke up and saw an alien at the foot of my bed holding onto the rod iron railing. i have a sleigh bed. as i was waking up i started to re-wet my contacts by blinking alot. then when i realized what i was seeing i started to freak out. i never believed people when they said they were so scared they were "frozen" until that night. when i saw it i tried to scream and nothing came out. i tried to hit my husband but my arms wouldn't move. it was shear terror feeling. after about 10 seconds (which felt like and eternity) i was able to get my arm to move a little. he saw me move and then his mouth went from this tiny little hole to a big opening and he ran out of my bed room and into the kitchen which was 3 feet from my bedroom door. i heard his feet when he hit the floor in the kitchen. after another 30 seconds or so i was able to scream and start moving. i hit my husband and got him up and told him what i saw. i turned every light on into the house and went into the kitchen. the back door was not open. i can tell you he is about 3 and a half feet tall. with reptile like skin, and is kinda glossy. it was a weird green / gray color. he had 3 fingers kinda long, and yes they were on my bed railing. i took my bed railing off and it's been in my attic ever since. i can't look at it. i told my father (a retired lt. colonel from the army national gaurd) the next day and other family members. so do i believe in aliens. yes i have seen one!!! i worked at ruth's chris steak house for 8 years so you know i am not a nut case.:) i am still married. my husband does commercial heating and air and i have twin boys 8 months old and a 2 year old daughter.
content.summary: Had an alien at the foot of my bed
